com.github.timia2109.jcron

Interface CronTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntervaledObject

    public interface CronTask
    Interface that represent a CronTask
    The execution can be scheduled

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exec()
      Executes the task.
      long getNextTime()
      Return the time mills when this task should executed.
      boolean restart()
      Returns if this task should be repeated.

    • Method Detail

      • restart

        boolean restart()
        Returns if this task should be repeated. When it should repeated then calculate the next execution time in this method! Runs always in JCron Thread
        Returns:
        true, if this task should be repeated!

      • getNextTime

        long getNextTime()
        Return the time mills when this task should executed. This value should only changed in constructor, in method restart() or before calling JCron.getInstance().reorder()
        Run always in JCron Thread
        Returns:
        Timemills for the next execution

      • exec

        void exec()
        Executes the task.
        May executed in new Thread or in JCron Thread
